com.charlie.Graphics.math3DUtils

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.charlie.Graphics.math3DUtils.Matrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectionMatrix, TransformationMatrix, ViewportMatrix

    public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Class matrix represents a matrix and operations that can be done on it. subclasses can be used to specify matrices used for specific things such as translation and rotation Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: Charlie Date: 1/24/11 Time: 2:37 PM this class represents the mathmatical concept of a matrix

      • multiply

        public Matrix multiply(Matrix rightMatrix)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Finds the cross product between this matrix and matrix m.
        Parameters:
        rightMatrix - the matrix to find the cross product with
        Returns:
        the resulting matrix of the cross product operation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Matrix m must have the same number of rows as the other matrix has columns, otherwise the operation is undefined and this will throw an exception
